src:
Liverpool vant etter utrolig snuoperasjon: ‚Äì Den beste f√∏lelsen man kan tenke seg
B√•de serieleder Liverpool og Manchester City slet seg til 2-1-seier i Premier League. Liverpool borte mot Aston Villa, mens City vant hjemme mot Southampton.
02 Nov 2019, 17:19 by NTB
Begge lagene l√• under 0-1 ved pause og snudde med to m√•l i annen omgang. Liverpool utlignet i det 87. minutt og avgjorde i fjerde overtidsminutt.

‚Äì Det er den beste f√∏lelsen man kan tenke seg. Det er veldig tilfredsstillende, og vinnerm√•let kom p√• et cornertrekk vi har trent en del p√•, sa manager J√ºrgen Klopp.

‚Äì Jeg hadde ikke tid til √• tenke p√• at vi var i ferd med √• tape, jeg tenkte bare p√• hvordan vi kunne score.
Det s√• lenge som om Aston Villa var laget som skulle p√•f√∏re Klopps menn det f√∏rste serietapet denne sesongen. Andy Robertsons heading p√• pasning fra Sadio Man√© tre minutter f√∏r slutt avverget det. Fire minutter p√• overtid var det Man√©s tur til √• score med hodet.
Det var Aston Villa som kunne juble f√∏rst p√• Villa Park. Det har n√¶rmest blitt en vane for spillerne √• feire litt behersket f√∏r et m√•l blir godkjent av VAR.
Trezeguet satte nemlig ballen i m√•l bak Alisson etter 21 minutter. Spillerne jublet for scoring, men det tok noen minutter f√∏r dommeren hadde f√•tt gr√∏nt lys fra VAR-teamet om at Trezeguet var onside p√• frisparket fra John McGinn.
Aston Villa hadde ogs√• hatt en god mulighet tidligere i omgangen p√• en d√∏dball.

King senket United ‚Äì etterp√• tok Solskj√¶r selvkritikk


Fakta: Premier League, l√∏rdag:

11. runde:

Bournemouth ‚Äì Manchester U. 1-0, Arsenal ‚Äì Wolverhampton 1-1, Aston Villa ‚Äì Liverpool 1-2, Brighton ‚Äì Norwich 2-0, Manchester C. ‚Äì Southampton 2-1, Sheffield U. ‚Äì Burnley 3-0, West Ham ‚Äì Newcastle 2-3, Watford ‚Äì Chelsea 1‚Äì2.
Spilles s√∏ndag: Crystal Palace ‚Äì Leicester, Everton ‚Äì Tottenham.

Offside
Sju minutter senere var det Liverpool spillernes tur til √• juble, men nok gang m√•tte VAR i aksjon p√• Roberto Firminos scoring. Denne gangen ble det derimot ikke m√•l p√• grunn av offside.

Liverpool satte inn en langspurt, og Sadio Man√© var n√¶r scoring flere ganger, men det var faktisk hjemmelaget som hadde den st√∏rste muligheten f√∏r gjestenes avgj√∏rende sluttspurt.

Southampton fikk s√• hatten passet med 0-9 mot Leicester for en dr√∏y uke siden. Laget har tydeligvis brukt tiden godt til √• nullstille seg. Etter 13 minutter hadde James Ward-Prowse scoret borte mot Manchester City.
Gjestene br√∏t et angrep h√∏yt i banen og gikk for en tidlig avslutning. City-m√•lvakten virket overrasket og Edison klarte ikke √• holde langskuddet fra Stuart Armstrong. Det ble en ekkel retur som Ward-Prowse scoret enkelt p√•.

Fantasy-tips: Bruke pengene p√• forsvar eller angrep? Dette kan v√¶re l√∏sningen p√• dilemmaet.



Sergio Ag√ºero scoret igjen for City.üì∑ ANDREW YATES / Reuters

Ag√ºero-m√•l
De regjerende mesterne trykket p√• for utligning, men det varte og rakk, og m√•let kom f√∏rst etter 70 minutter. N√¶rmest som vanlig var Sergio Ag√ºero sist p√• ballen da han styrte Kyle Walkers innlegg i m√•l.
Walker ble matchvinner fire minutter f√∏r full tid, etter en periode med et heftig City-press.

‚Äì Det er vanskelig √• m√∏te et lag som hele tiden har 11 mann bak ballen, men vi holdt oss til kampplanen og fikk alle poengene, sa Walker. Serietoer City er fortsatt seks poeng bak Liverpool.

Arsenal ledet lenge hjemme mot Wolverhampton etter scoring av Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, men Ra√∫l Jim√©nez berget 1-1 for gjestene. Dermed fikk London-laget en ny nedtur i en t√∏ff uke.
Sheffield United klatret til 6.-plass, poenget bak Arsenal, med 3-0-seier over Burnley etter to m√•l av John Lundstram, mens Newcastle tok tre viktige poeng i bunnstriden med 3-2 borte mot West Ham.
Brighton vant 2-0 over Norwich, som er nest sist.
Senere l√∏rdag kveld slo Chelsea tabelljumbo Watford 2‚Äì1 p√• bortebane. Tammy Abraham og Christian Pulisic scoret Chelseas m√•l. Bl√•tr√∏yene fra London klatret opp p√• tredjeplass i Premier League med seieren. Du kan lese mer om kampen her.
text:
Liverpool won after incredible turnaround: - The best feeling imaginable
Both Liverpool manager and Manchester City struggled to a 2-1 victory in the Premier League. Liverpool away from Aston Villa, while City won at home to Southampton.
02 Nov 2019, 17:19 by NTB
Both teams were below 0-1 at the break and turned in two goals in the second half. Liverpool equalized in the 87th minute and settled in the fourth overtime minute.

- It's the best feeling you can imagine. It's very satisfying, and the winning goal came on a corner draw we've been training for, "said manager J√ºrgen Klopp.

- I didn't have time to think we were losing, I just thought about how we could score.
As long as Aston Villa was made to inflict Klopp's men the first series loss this season. Andy Robertson header from Sadio Man√© three minutes before finally averted it. Four minutes into overtime it was Man√©'s turn to score with his head.
It was Aston Villa who could cheer first at Villa Park. It has almost become a habit for players to celebrate a little restrained before a goal is approved by the VAR.
Trezeguet put the ball behind Alisson after 21 minutes. The players cheered for scoring, but it took a few minutes before the referee got the green light from the VAR team that Trezeguet was onside on John McGinn's free kick.
Aston Villa had also had a good opportunity earlier in the round on a death ball.

King sunk United - afterwards, Solskj√¶r took self-criticism


Facts: Premier League, Saturday:

Round 11:

Bournemouth - Manchester U. 1-0, Arsenal - Wolverhampton 1-1, Aston Villa - Liverpool 1-2, Brighton - Norwich 2-0, Manchester C. - Southampton 2-1, Sheffield U. - Burnley 3-0, West Ham - Newcastle 2-3, Watford - Chelsea 1-2.
Played Sunday: Crystal Palace - Leicester, Everton - Tottenham.

offside
Seven minutes later it was the Liverpool players' turn to cheer, but once again VAR had to be in action on Roberto Firmino's scoring. This time, however, there were no goals due to offside.

Liverpool put in a long spurt and Sadio Man√© was close to scoring several times, but it was actually the home team that had the greatest opportunity before the visitors' decisive final spurt.

Southampton then got the hat matched 0-9 against Leicester just over a week ago. The team has obviously used time well to reset. After 13 minutes, James Ward-Prowse had scored away from Manchester City.
The guests broke an attack high into the field and went for an early finish. The City goalkeeper seemed surprised and Edison failed to keep Stuart Armstrong's long shot. It was a nasty return that Ward-Prowse scored easily.

Fantasy tips: Spend your money on defense or attack? This may be the solution to the dilemma.



Sergio Ag√ºero scored again for City.üì∑ ANDREW YATES / Reuters

Ag√ºero Goals
The reigning champions pressed for equalization, but it lasted and ran, and the goal came only after 70 minutes. Almost as usual, Sergio Ag√ºero was last on the ball when he directed Kyle Walker's goal into the goal.
Walker became match winner four minutes before full time, after a period of intense City pressure.

"It's hard to face a team that always has 11 men behind the ball, but we stuck to the game plan and got all the points," Walker said. The City Tour is still six points behind Liverpool.

Arsenal led Wolverhampton for a long time after scoring by Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, but Ra√∫l Jim√©nez saved 1-1 for the visitors. Thus, the London team suffered another downturn in a tough week.
Sheffield United climbed to 6th place, the point behind Arsenal, with a 3-0 win over Burnley after two goals by John Lundstram, while Newcastle took three key points in the bottom match with 3-2 away against West Ham.
Brighton won 2-0 over Norwich, which is second last.
Later on Saturday night, Chelsea beat the table jumble Watford 2‚Äì1 away. Tammy Abraham and Christian Pulisic scored Chelsea's goals. The London Blue Jerseys climbed to third place in the Premier League with the win. You can read more about the fight here.
